rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An open and airy entrance with a minimalist design. Large floor-to-ceiling windows allow natural light to flood the space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area designed for relaxation and social gatherings, featuring subtle furniture arrangements.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan dining space integrated with the living room for flexible usage.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom designed for guests. Minimalist fixtures with ample natural light from adjacent windows.

openings.location: North side of Living Room and Entrance Hall
openings.description: Large windows providing expansive views while ensuring privacy.

openings.location: Between Entrance Hall and Living Area
openings.description: Modern sliding door that enhances the flow between spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A serene bedroom with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. A built-in walk-in closet is integrated into the design.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy and functional space designed for privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An efficiently designed minimalist kitchen with ample natural light from large windows on one side. Open to the dining area via a sliding door.

openings.description: Large windows that bring in natural light and ensure a sense of openness.
Seamless transition between cooking and dining spaces.

vastu_considerations.entrance_orientation: East or North for positive energy.
